roleset.name: collect onesself
roleset.note: REGROUP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'regroup' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from regroup.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: basic usage
example.text: After the 1987 crash, and as a result of the recommendations of many studies, ``circuit breakers'' were devised to allow market participants to regroup and restore orderly market conditions.
